Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Consisting of 4 uniquely designed luxurious villas, all having private pools with hydromassage (except Dioni) and a view to the special sunset of Bali and to a picturesque beach. Villas with spacious and comfortable living room with a fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining room, a private pool with hydromassage (except Dioni), and the possibility to use a BBQ.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located at a distance of 35 km from Heraklion â€“ Rethymno.
